name: Professional Services: not elsewhere classified
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for non–face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants engaged in traditional professions that offer highly
specialized services, and often require employees to obtain advanced
or specialized education or training to provide the services. This MCC
should be used only if the merchant’s business is not described by
another, more specific MCC. Examples of such merchants include
mortgage brokers, research firms, financial planners, graphic
designers, guest speakers and lecturers, court stenographers, real
estate appraisers, research firms, and auction houses.
